INVOKE.COMMENT: 1.2--Extract doc type, priority, and sender information from header
1.4--Extract the XML data (string) encompassed by the Body node

SEQUENCE.COMMENT: STEP 2 -- Log extracted data in a queue

INVOKE.COMMENT: 2.2--Log message data in the appropriate queue

BRANCH.COMMENT: Check whether message data was successfully placed in queue

SEQUENCE.NAME: $default
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: 3.1--If successful, put receipt in response message

SEQUENCE.NAME: %QU_receipt/msg%=/^ERROR/
